job_tasks.phrase: build data processing pipelines, preparing ready-to-train datasets for large models
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the creation and maintenance of data pipelines and the preparation of datasets, which are core to data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: using machine learning techniques to build data processing pipelines
job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions 'machine learning techniques' in the context of building pipelines, indicating an application of ML to data processing.

job_tasks.phrase: work with the software development life cycle, from ideation through implementation, to testing and release
job_tasks.justification: This highlights experience with the end-to-end process of creating software, a key aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: prepare data most effectively for usage in large scale models
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on optimizing data for the training of large-scale models, a direct involvement in the modeling process.

job_tasks.phrase: Use Big Data tools and frameworks to process, analyse, and derive insights from structured and unstructured data
job_tasks.justification: This describes the use of tools for processing and analyzing large datasets, which falls under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with other ML Engineers and Researchers to understand their data requirements and provide them with ready-to-train datasets
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding data needs and supplying prepared datasets, aligning with data engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring the performance of data pipeline and machine learning models, troubleshoot data-related issues, and perform root cause analysis to implement strategic solutions
job_tasks.justification: This covers monitoring, troubleshooting, and problem-solving related to data pipelines and ML models in operation, fitting MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and tools in machine learning and data engineering to continually improve our data infrastructure
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes continuous improvement of data infrastructure and staying current with data engineering tools.

job_tasks.phrase: Document data pipeline architecture and workflow, present findings to relevant stakeholders, and provide training as needed
job_tasks.justification: Documenting pipelines and communicating technical details to stakeholders is part of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: help develop our LLM-based TTS system that will provide our customers with voice clones that are indistinguishable from real voices
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of a user-facing system powered by LLMs, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: create high quality, production ready code and take ownership of production pipelines
job_tasks.justification: This focuses on writing production-ready code and managing production pipelines, key aspects of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Leveraging your understanding of machine learning algorithms and workflows
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the need for understanding ML algorithms and workflows, which is central to modeling.

soft_skills.phrase: troubleshoot data-related issues, and perform root cause analysis to implement strategic solutions
Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and tools in machine learning and data engineering
Collaborating with other ML Engineers and Researchers to understand their data requirements and provide them with ready-to-train datasets
present findings to relevant stakeholders, and provide training as needed

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes building data processing pipelines, preparing datasets for large models, and monitoring ML model performance. While LLMs are mentioned, the core focus is on the data engineering and traditional ML modeling aspects required to support them, rather than advanced GenAI model development itself.
